title: Irene's sweet potato pie
ingredients: ['400g cooked sweet potatoes, mashed', '2 eggs', '300ml evaporated milk', '75g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons rum', '4 tablespoons melted butter', '1 pastry case (or shortcrust pastry for 23cm pie)']
